<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Call to Arms](/Spells.aspx?ID=748)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 230 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Battle](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=2)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You are about to roll for initiative.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 20-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You cry out a call to arms, inspiring your allies to enter the fray. Each ally in the area gains a +2 status bonus to their initiative roll and gains temporary Hit Points equal to the spell's level; these temporary Hit Points last for the spell's duration.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The bonus increases to +3.

**Heightened (9th)** The bonus increases to +4.
name: Call to Arms
